channel.title: ||||| Endeavor - 250 days in dev - Perfect Combat - Dung - Hunger Games - Sounds
channel.description:
[CENTER] [IMG]http://endeavor-ps.com/forums/digitalvb/morbid_dark/misc/vbulletin4_logo.png[/img] [SIZE=4][FONT=Century Gothic] Endeavor is an economy based server that aims to be very unique and to be one of the most realistic emulators on the market. Endeavor is a server that is meant to stand out from the crowd - this is why we strive to be unique and to break precedents. You will not get the same experience from other private servers. We have dedicated and professional adults working with us to bring you an exciting game, a friendly community, and a mature and friendly staff.
[COLOR=green]Beta is live![/COLOR]
[URL=http://"http://www.endeavor-ps.com"] Click here to join the forum and get ready for beta![/URL] [URL=http://endeavor-ps.com/client.jar]Click here to play now![/URL]
[SIZE=2] Endeavor is based on [I]Runesource[/I]. Runesource is licensed under the [URL=http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0-standalone.html]GNU General Public License Version 3[/URL]. You can pick up a free version of Runesource [URL=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/downloads/504052-original-runesource-runesource-netty.html]here[/URL]. [/SIZE]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WO44XFd8nRA[/youtube]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/D3aFQw2.png[/img]
[B]Welcome to Endeavor – one of the most realistic emulators on the market.[/B]
[B]Combat[/B]
We have the most realistic combat system of any server on the market today. There is sounds for everything, including all weapons and monsters. Our clipping system is flawless and is one of the most realistic there is. You can't shoot over walls, you can't walk on objects, and monsters cannot walk on each other. The bosses are relentless and unforgiving. The combat formulas are fine-tuned and almost exact. If you don't believe us, try it yourself! [B] Mini-games[/B]
The mini-games are a thrill and are very exciting. They are put together to ensure the maximum-playability and the highest possible quality of game-play. The mini-game will be synced to the Highscores so you can compete with your fellow friends and players! The current mini-games are: Barrows, Custom Dicing, Duel Arena, Fight Pits, God Wars, The Hunger Games, Pest Control, Fight Pits, and Zombies!
[B]Skilling[/B]
The skills have been perfected and finely-tuned. Each formula is specific for it's task – to be exact and realistic. Using higher level tools helps the current action you're doing. The skills are: Agility, Cooking, Crafting, Firemaking, Fishing, Fletching, Herblore, Runecrafting, Thieving, and Woodcutting. The skills are twice as hard to train as combat skills – and they are on the Highscores, so get ready for competitive game-play.
[B]An Interactive World[/B]
Endeavor is a realistic emulator in every sense. The world is completely interactive. There are monsters and other characters all over the map – they will all talk to you. Every door and gate will open. You can search through chests, drawers, wardrobes, hay bales, and other things. Music will play all around the map, and all actions have a corresponding sound.
[B]The Community[/B]
Endeavor is based on community, we are brought up by it. We listen to our community and we create the content that they enjoy and want to see in the game. The economy is based on players interacting with one another. This creates an exciting environment – when you're in the wilderness you are risking your items. This makes the PvP much more exciting. [B] The Staff Team[/B]
We are nothing without our dedicated staff team and developers. Endeavor has some of the most experienced developers in the community today – collectively over 20 years of experience. We have a professional staff team that is moderated by other senior moderators. This ensures the behavior of our staff is where it needs to be, and that they are treating the position as it should be treated. [B] We're waiting for you![/B]
We always welcome new members into the community. There's always a spot for you in Endeavor. So what are you waiting for? Just log in!
[B]| Features |[/B] Active economy Amazing combat Perfect clipping Realistc PvM and PvP Sounds for almost every weapon/monster/action Mini-quests Random events Nearly all skills working EP wilderness system Warriors' guild Fight caves Fight pits Barrows Dueling Hunger Games Dungeoneering Bossing

item.title: ||||| Endeavor - 250 days in dev - Perfect Combat - Dung - Hunger Games - Sounds
item.dc:creator: @birdhouse919 birdhouse919
item.description:
@birdhouse919 wrote:

There have been a TON of new updates:

Some are the following:

[code]Grave stones added for if you’re killed by a mob, read to loot
Grave stones have about 10 different messages other players and you can read
Camelot teleport is now Catherby
Farming added (even did diseasing but because of config errors it’s removed for now)
Farming shop added
Santa removed from Vote shop
Santa costume added to Vote shop
Mobs now drop all seeds
Casket drop chances nerfed
Key drop chances nerfed
Rare (or shared) drop table nerfed
All rare drops are now slightly more rare
Chat logs added
Dragon defender added to Warriors guild
Agility shop added
Pet gnome added (bought via the Agility shop)
Getting “You have been poisoned!” over and over again fixed
AGS not protecting over a whip fixed (many items with the same glitch fixed)
Frost dragons added to Bosses teleport
Frost dragons now drop Glaiven boots, Ragefire boots, and Steadfast boots
Boot drops are extremely rare
Defender drops are now slightly more rare
Not being able to teleport when leaving Warriors’ guild fixed
Headicon for SoulSplit added server sided
Frost dragons now require 85 Dungeoneering

Client:

New login screen (Thanks to Motions for designing!)
Added ground texturing for HD mode
Added texture support to models; should no longer be any white models!
Fixed transparent player eyes
Fixed female equipment offset
Fixed map functions above id 80
Fixed all minimap colors, such as lava, water, etc
Added missing map data for kq
Fixed bug where you could see and click the tab icons while banking
Added new music interfaces, with a total of 676 playable songs
Fixed environment sound volume
Fixed sound volume
Added donator crown images
Fixed offset for clicking when split chat is toggled off
Added right click autocast to magic spells
Fixed bug where gfx appears before animation, causing it to flash once before functioning properly
Added toggle for old and new hitpoint bars on the customization screen
Added LD, SD and HD mode toggle on customization screen
Added context menu toggle on customization screen
Added hitmark toggle on customization screen
Added constituion toggle on customization screen
Added dragon defender, capes of distinction, dragon (g) armour and dragon masks to the client)
New loading bar (Again, thanks to Motions for designing)
When using an item on a player/npc/item the tooltip will now be “Use -->” instead of "Use with"
When casting a spell on a player/npc the tooltip will now be “Cast -->” instead of "Cast on"
Added curse head icons
Added EXP counter
Fixed zoom for heads in player dialogues
Added 602 clothing & hair styles
Added a lot more colors for hair & clothes
Fixed crash when you entered a too high number when using enter X
Fixed spirit shield model priorities
Added ability to load custom fonts (currently used for login screen)
Temporary replaced construction with dungeoneering in the skill tab until it is upgraded
Ancient teleports now light up
When clicking on an option on the context menu it will no longer do a duplicate action. E.G dropping an item on the bottom row inventory would make you click on of the bottoms tabs
Added an EV button underneath the EXP counter which will be made use of later on (Thanks to Motions for modifying the XP image)
Fixed the bug if you would right click around the run orb and moved the cursor to the run orb the menu would get bugged
Added the commands ::forums, ::vote, ::donate, which links to to corresponding pages
Added mini GWD bosses to the client (Probably going to be reward from Arms Race)
Fixed kree’arra going invisible when flying to high[/code]

New client has been released including HD now as well as a custom loading screen.

Join Today!
10-30 players online at all times now!

Read full topic

item.title: ||||| Endeavor - 250 days in dev - Perfect Combat - Dung - Hunger Games - Sounds
item.dc:creator: @birdhouse919 birdhouse919
item.description:
@birdhouse919 wrote:

Latest updates!:

Auto-donation system. IGN forums field added to all themes. - *To apply: settings>Edit Profile>In-Game Name:* SEO settings perfected. SMS donations. Auto-donations for the regular donator status will now give you the status via forums. Added one forums rule. - Number 4. The Off-Topic category has been renamed to "The Lounge". Created prefix sets for four different forums sections. Created Prefix's for the suggestions section, staff applications section, updates section, news section, guides section, and in staff zone. ( Prefix's = Server, Forum) The Spam Here section renamed to "Spam". Reported Post section completely cleaned/Handled.

We hit 30 players online yesterday and to celebrate for the milestone, one of our players decided to have his own drop party.

Read full topic

item.source: ||||| Endeavor - 250 days in dev - Perfect Combat - Dung - Hunger Games - Sounds

item.title: ||||| Endeavor - 250 days in dev - Perfect Combat - Dung - Hunger Games - Sounds
item.dc:creator: @Mikey_Sasse Mikey Sasse
item.description:
@Mikey_Sasse wrote:

Latest updates from today and yesterday!


Mobs will now teleport home if they can't walk home after they are no longer viewable
Added extra cheat client protection
Added "other player is busy" flags to everything
Trading patched
Fixed Slayer mask and Full slayer helm bonuses
Revenant global message increased to 5 minutes
Revenants will now heal by 100 hitpoints when they drop below 50 hitpoints
If you run from a Revenant who has already healed, he will have regained the ability to heal when you get back
Revenant spawns all re-done (17 different areas)
Mage bank added to Wilderness portal
Clan Wars added to Wilderness portal (Clan Wars and the portal functionality is coming soon)
God Capes added to Magic shop
Infinity prices increased
Magic shortbow price increased to 18k
Farseer helm added to the Magic shop
Banker added to Clan Wars
Aquanite's drop the Amulet of Ranging, Ranger boots, Magic boots, and the Robin Hood hat
Rare drop table chance decreased
Aquanite's and Dark beast's now drop Dragon arrows
New dungeon added: Lumbridge Swamp dungeon (Aquanite's, Waterfiends, etc)
Waterfiend's drop all the trimmed amulets and gilded armour
Jelly's drop trimmed and gold-trimmed dragon hide
Kurask drops Crystal Shield and the Leaf-bladed sword
Terror dog's drop Granite armour
Lumbridge swamp monsters have Slayer requirements (the one that have them on RS)
Lumbridge swamp monsters added to Slayer tasks
Dark Beasts added to Slayer tasks
Balmung has been added to the Dagannoth king's drops
Balmung requires 75 Attack and Strength
Balmung increases max hits on Dagannoth king's by 25%
Wall Beast's in Lumbridge swamp will hit you (you cannot attack them)
Made Magic shortbow special look a lot better
Dark bow special and normal projectiles improved
Bolt special chance fixed
You can now receive 1/4 experience from a Social Slayer partner even if they don't have the task too
Max level offsets between client and server fixed
Slayer shop prices increased
Chaotic longsword strength lowered
Fire wave runes corrected
God spells added and have correct effects
Charge now effects the max hits of God spells
God spells added to Magic shop
Bind, Snare, and Entangle now work
Arcane Stream necklace added to Dungeoneering shop
Hell hound is now stronger
Fixed tele-block
Spirit shields now have there effects
Dueling fixed
All Miasmic spells added
Revs and Bork now drop Zuriel's staff
- Unclickable objects fixed by Alex (Dungeoneering/Corp should be accessable)

@Donators, you will notice an empty bar beside you name in the chatbox, this is where your crown will be in a few days

Alexander:

- Fixed the color of received PMs when not using split private chat
- Re-done crowns and added staff crowns back
- When a message is too long to fit the chat area the "*" next to the message you're typing will turn red
- Fixed map scenes when the object ID was above 32,767
- Fixed object clicking when the object ID was above 32,767
- Added the rank icon next to name in the input-bar
- Objects without a name are no longer clickable and won't show as "null"
- When right clicking a staff member ingame there will be a staff icon next to their name (and donators once the crowns are added)

Read full topic
item.source: ||||| Endeavor - 250 days in dev - Perfect Combat - Dung - Hunger Games - Sounds

item.title: ||||| Endeavor - 250 days in dev - Perfect Combat - Dung - Hunger Games - Sounds
item.dc:creator: @birdhouse919 birdhouse919
item.description:
@birdhouse919 wrote:

Join today!

Latest updates:

You now have to click to access the ‘Attack’ option for players in your clan
Clan chat is now updating correctly
PVP weapons now degrade after 1000 hits
Cows added outside Edgeville walls past skilling area
Lunar teleports now light up --------------sprite update
All teleport names fixed
Not facing fishing spots patched
High graphics for mobs fixed
MSB special button fixed
Spiritual mages now have the right animations/gfx/projectiles
Started Revenants
Fixed multi area overlay
Revenants surround themselves with a multi area of 15x15
A random Revenant location is announced globally every 5 minutes
Revenants have a 16 tile magic/ranged distance
MSB special amount increased to 55
Various prices lowered
Infinity added to magic shop
All revenants drop PVP armour and master wands (rare drops), and assorted items and lower wands (common)
5 more Revenant spawns added
Team capes added outside the Edgeville Wilderness ditch
Auto-cast button fixed
Master wand now gives 10% damage bonus
Slayer points system added, per task: hard - 7, medium - 5, easy - 2
Get-task option for Vanakka now works
Dragon dagger (p++) now in shop
Buy-items option on RFD chest opens Consumables shop
Dying whips with Slayer shop dye
When you die with a died whip (and lose it), the whip reverts to normal and you lose the dye
You can now imbue rings, you won’t lose them on death
Dyed whips protect over un-dyed whips
Fixed low alch price being high alch price and the reverse
Desert Strykeworms added
Desert s. worms retreat when health is below half
Desert s. worms have accurate magic, and high-hitting ranged/melee
Desert s. worms added to boss teleport, drops staff of light and pieces needed for slayer helm
Desert s. worms have a lvl 90 slayer requirement (not sure what it is on RS but 90 will do)
Weapon names drawing on the wrong string fixed
There is a 1/4 chance thance that a magic attack with the SOL won’t cost any runes
You can now assemble and take apart the Full slayer helm
Music re-enabled, sound disabled until volume works
Music volume now save on logout
Fixed Dungeoneering objects not showing fixed
Fixed auto retaliate button on all weapons
Revenants now drop the Mages’ book
Rare drops don’t send a global message if you’re in the wild
Colored whips now have specials and sounds
Slayer helmet gives 12.5% attack/str bonus for all styles against your task
Confirm dialogue added to taking apart god swords
Improved crossbow projectile

Read full topic
